comments.author: vors
comments.body:
Also, ubuntu 16.04 would be nice.
It's not officially supported by dotnet yet, but it's easy to install [missed dependencies](https://github.com/aspnet/dnx/issues/3059#issuecomment-150670962)

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: I don't think we need to add different distributions to the CI. This is managed code we're building, with a very small POSIX compliant native library. Now a nightly build validation is a different matter, as we want to produce packages. But I feel hat is outside the scope of continuous integration.
